text: @realDonaldTrump GREATNESS! You killed over 76,000 Americans & let 1.2 million contract COVID-19 because of your refusal to prepare the country in January. Now you want the country to open while the numbers keep climbing! Sad you think killing people is a TRANSITION TO GREATNESS!
